title: Pezroly
author: Pezroly
content: For best Web experience use geek aproved soft - Firefox browser with uBlock Origin plus AVG Antivirus Free. Firefox have a lot of addons, like uBlock Origin for ad blocking, and AVG Antivirus Free comes with popular Avast Antivirus engine, do not lag the system and have file shredder with owerwriting. Additional malware tool - Farbar Recovery Scan Tool would be great too.https://www.mozilla.org/en-US/firefox/new/https://addons.mozilla.org/en-US/firefox/addon/ublock-origin/https://www.avg.com/en-ww/free-antivirus-downloadhttps://www.bleepingcomputer.com/download/farbar-recovery-scan-tool/Smart software choice will help you block ads and fight better against various viruses and malware.
